How many people are affected by Fanconi anemia ?,"Fanconi anemia occurs in 1 in 160,000 individuals worldwide. This condition is more common among people of Ashkenazi Jewish descent, the Roma population of Spain, and black South Africans.",GHR,Fanconi anemia
